sentence: Ryan is considered the favorite for the Democratic nomination in small primary field that also includes progressive Morgan Harper, a former Consumer Financial Protection Bureau senior adviser and 2020 congressional candidate.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump ally Marjorie Taylor Greene endorses JD Vance in Ohio GOP Senate showdown

sentence: The winner of the Republican primary will face the winner of a Democratic primary that includes 10-term U.S. Rep. Tim Ryan and progressive Morgan Harper, a former consumer protection attorney.
author: Associated Press
title: GOP’s Rob Portman backs Timken to succeed him in US Senate

title: GOP’s Rob Portman backs Timken to succeed him in US Senate
